definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be bowed down, afflicted ( NH id.; MI Pi. [[ויענו]] l:5, [[אענו]] l:6; As. enû thwart, frustrate, do violence to; Ar. 9nw, 9ana0 be lowly subsmissive, v. Rahlfs: [[עָנִי]] und [[עָנׇי]] in d. Psalmen (1892), 67 ff.; Targum [[עַנִּי]] Pa. oppress; Syr. Ethpe. humble oneself, and deriv.);—Qal Pf. 1 S. [[עָנִיתִי]] Ps 116:10; Impf. 3 ms. [[יַעֲנֶה]] Is 25:5, Is 31:4, etc.;—
be put down or become low, of song of triumph Is 25:5 (others as

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: he putteth down, ‖[[תַּכְנִיעַ]]).
be depressed, downcast Is 31:4 (of lion; ‖[[יֵחָָת]]).
be afficted Ps 116:10, Ps 119:67, Zec 10:2.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[נַעֲניתִי]] Ps 119:107; Inf. cstr. [[לֵעָנׁת]] (perh. rd. as Qal Ges:§ 51 l) Ex 10:3; Pt. [[נַעֲנֶה]] Is 53:7; fs. [[נַעֲנׇה]] Is 58:10; —
humble oneself [[מִפְּנֵי]] Ex 10:3.
be afficted Ps 119:107, Is 53:7, Is 58:10.

definitions.title: Piel.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[עִנׇּה]] De 22:24 + 5 t.; 2 ms. [[עִנִּיתָ]] Ps 88:8; 1 S. [[עִנֵּיתִי]] Ps 35:13, sf. [[וְעִנִּתִךְ]] consec. Na 1:12, etc.; Impf. [[יְעַנֶּה]] Job 37:23, etc,; Imv. [[עַנּוּ]] Ju Jdg 19:24; Inf. abs. [[עַנֵּה]] Ex 22:22; cstr. [[עַנּוֹת]] Is 58:5 + , etc.; Pt. pl. sf. [[מְעַנַּיִךְ]] Is 60:14, Zep 3:19; —

humble, mishandle, afflict: individual Ge 16:6, Ge 31:50 (J) Ex 22:21, Ex 22:22, Ex 22:22 (E) Job 30:11; by imprisonment and bonds Ju Jdg 16:5, Jdg 16:6, Jdg 16:19, Ps 105:18; a nation by war or in bondage Ge 15:13 (J) Ex 1:11, Ex 1:12, Nu 24:24, Nu 24:24 (E) De 26:6, 1Sa 12:8 (inserting [[וַיְעַנּוּם מִחְרַיִם]], so LXX Dr Bu Kit HPS [cf. Th We]), 2Sa 7:10, 2Ki 17:20, Ps 94:5, Is 60:14, Zep 3:19; dynasty of David Ps 89:23.
humble, a woman by cohabit., Ge 34:2 (J) De 21:14, De 22:24, De 22:29, Ju Jdg 19:24, Jdg 20:5, 2Sa 13:12, 2Sa 13:14, 2Sa 13:22, 2Sa 13:32, Ez Eze 22:10, Eze 22:11, La 5:11.
afflict as a discipline (God agent) De 8:2, De 8:3, De 8:16, 1Ki 11:39, Ps 88:8, Ps 90:15, Ps 119:75, Is 64:11, Na 1:12, Na 1:12, La 3:33.

humble, weaken, obj. [[כּׂחַ]] Ps 102:24; [[משׁפט]] Job 37:23 (cf. Talm. [[עִנׇּה דִּין]]); [[נֶפֶשׁ]] oneself, by fasting Le 16:29, Le 16:31, Le 23:27, Le 23:32, Nu 29:7 (P) Ps 35:13, Is 58:3, Is 58:5; by an oath Nu 30:14 (P).
be afflicted, in discipline by God Ps 119:71, Ps 132:1, Is 53:4.
be humbled by fasting Le 23:29 (P).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. sf. [[תַּעֲנֵם]] 1Ki 8:35 = 2Ch 6:26 afflict, in discipline.
humble oneself (c. [[תַּחַת יׇדֶיהָ]]) Ge 16:9 (J).
be afflicted, by men 1Ki 2:26, 1Ki 2:26; by God in discipline Ps 107:17.
humble oneself in fasting Ezr 8:21, Da 10:12.
